item.title: White-Collar-Criminals.org, Accusation Against Douglas Goare: A Call for Immediate Response
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2015-12-15_2315_0800-accusing-douglas-goare-of-being-a-white-collar-criminal.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: Right of reply Date sent: December 15, 2015, 23:15 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Douglas Goare <Doug.Goare@eu.mcd.com> Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2015-12-15_2315_0800-accusing-douglas-goare-of-being-a-white-collar-criminal.pdf Mr. Goare, Even though I’ve never contacted you in person before, I believe it’s impossible for you not to be aware that I am accusing McDonald’s of having committed multiple massive frauds in different countries within the European Union.

item.title: White-Collar-Criminals.org, Accusation Against Malcolm Hicks: A Call for Immediate Response
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2015-12-15_2257_0800-accusing-malcolm-hicks-of-being-a-white-collar-criminal.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: Right of reply Date sent: December 15, 2015, 22:57 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Malcolm Hicks <Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com> Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2015-12-15_2257_0800-accusing-malcolm-hicks-of-being-a-white-collar-criminal.pdf Mr. Hicks, I am accusing you of being a white-collar criminal. I’ve created the website white-collar-criminals.com and you will be listed on it from now on. I am offering you a right of reply but you must use it within 48 hours.

item.title: Malcolm Hicks, Corporate Vice President of McDonald’s Europe and General Counsel
item.description:
Click on this link to visualize the original email: MCD-2–2015-10-23-05h34CN_Redacted.pdf

On October 23, 2015, I receive an email from Malcolm Hicks <Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com> who is the Corporate Vice President of McDonald’s Europe.

From: Malcolm Hicks <Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com>

Subject: France Monopoly Game Query

Date received: October 23, 2015 at 05:34 +0800 (Beijing time)

To: Vincent B. Le Corre
